metadata.title: CVE-2024-3772 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Regular expression denial of service in Pydanic < 2.4.0, < 1.10.13 allowsremote attackers to cause denial of service via a crafted email string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-3772` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pydantic - 1.10.14-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pydantic package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.14-1').
